org-entry-head.org-entry-name: National Conservation Centre of Cultural Heritage

dir-section.heading: Cultural Heritage
dir-section.p: In 2021 there were 25 major museums, attended by 184,156 people, compared with 427,493 museum visitors in 2018 (prior to the COVID-19 pandemic).
